website_summaries.verdict: For ladies who are looking for a shoe with a sleek silhouette that is perfect for everyday wear, the Ecco Bluma Toggle is worth a try. It looks good with casual outfits especially jeans and shorts. Unlike some other sneakers, this shoe is not clunky and provides a comfortable fit. It is also suitable for walking as it supplies good cushioning impact.Excellent value for the money, the Ecco Bluma Toggle has the right blend of comfort and style that anyone is looking for.
pros: The low-top Ecco Bluma Toggle is praised by most customers because of its stylish silhouette
They found and described it as “amazing,” “classy,” “wonderful,” “unique,” “nice” and “elegant.”
Majority appreciated the shoe and would recommend it to their relatives and friends
Several satisfied buyers said that they decided to buy another pair
It is a versatile shoe, commented by a few
Some of the purchasers stated that this footwear is durable
Many reviewers attested that the Ecco Bluma Toggle is a comfortable sneaker
Several wearers said it provides excellent arch support
It is easy to slip on, noted by a consumer
cons: A few complained about the limited color selection
They wished that Ecco Bluma Toggle would be available in white again
A user perceived that the shoe somehow runs small

customer_reviews.title: High Collar in Front and Back Not For Everyone
customer_reviews.text: This is a great-looking shoe and of fine quality, BUT I had to return them because the high collar on the front and back were not comfortable on my feet. I have other styles of the ECCO brand that fit perfectly and look as nice so I was disappointed to have to send these back.
customer_reviews.author: LJMn

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I have a bunion on my right foot that this shoe doesn t bother me at all
customer_reviews.author: Robby O'Brien

customer_reviews.title: Runs Long
customer_reviews.text: These run a bit narrow as I find most Ecco shoes do, but because they are a nice stretchy fabric this isn't an issue. However, they fit rather long in the toe, I might try a half size down and see if that makes a difference.
customer_reviews.author: S Wingo

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy
customer_reviews.text: I had to reorder them half a size smaller as they fit a bit large. They are super comfortable. The only thing I do not like is that the insole comes out every time you take the shoe off, but other than that - I am glad I bought the shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I have a narrow instep and heel, but these were WAYYYY too narrow. Had to return :-(
customer_reviews.author: Christine Ibanez

customer_reviews.title: Great looking, a little big.
customer_reviews.text: Too big, so I sent them back. Great looking shoes, but they were out of my proper size.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe for a narrow foot! Very comfortable and high quality, too.
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Cheaply made, really thin and too tight for the toe area.
customer_reviews.author: Tatiana

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: This shoe neither looks as good or feels as good as it's better brother. I am disappointed in them.
customer_reviews.author: Jean Pristou

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: The shoe is very narrow at the toe front and much tighter than expected. Had to return.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthxx

customer_reviews.title: I don't like the shoe and am sorry I bought it online
customer_reviews.text: I don't like the shoe and am sorry I bought it online. It is too big and yet it manages to pull my socks out of position when I put the shoe on. The sole is thin. It is a cheaply made shoe. I will never buy Ecco again.
customer_reviews.author: Dee Dee

product_meta.title: ECCO womens Ecco Women's Bluma Sport Toggle Flat
product_meta.description: ECCO Womens Size Conversion Chart It's game, set and match! Stay on top of your game with the ultrahip ECCO® Bluma Sport Toggle sneak. Soft leather and textile upper with contrast stitching and perforations. Bungee lace-up closure for an adjustable fit. Textile lining with microfiber color pop detail. Removable microfiber inlay sole with ECCO Comfort Fibre System (ECFS). Internal PU wedge. Direct injected, one-component outsole with TPU insert in heel for added stability. Imported. Measurements: Weight: 7 oz Product measurements were taken using size 40 (US Women's 9-9.5), width M. Please note that measurements may vary by size.
feature_bullets: A feminine and sporty sneaker with toggle speed lace
Uppers made of soft, rich leathers and textile
Textile lining with microfiber color pop detail
Removable microfiber inlay sole with ecco comfort fibre system and internal pu wedge
Direct-injected, one-component outsole with tpu insert in heel
